channel.title: Respectfulness on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Respectfulness on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Respectful of Diversity
item.description: DEFINITION Demonstrates one’s respect for and appreciation of people from various backgrounds and of varying viewpoints. It also involves a commitment to the equitable treatment of all employees by recognizing, acknowledging and valuing individual differences and needs through the principles of acceptance and accommodation. QUESTIONS In order to meet the requirements of the lab quality program, your supervisor asks you to check the analytical records of one of your colleagues. You realize that your colleague has made several errors in his record.
